page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Two of the most popular games we play are{"Grandmother's Footsteps"}:one person in the game turns their back on the others who stand about 5m away.The object of the game is to touch that person who keeps turning round quickly without them seeing you move.Anyone seen moving goes back to the start.The first person to touch is the next on."Simon Says":-One person is Simon.He tells you to do different things by saying "Simon says do this"and you must copy him.If he tells you to do something without saying "Simon says"then you must not do it or you are out.Other games we play are:Bulldog,Run away children, Polo, Cops & robbers, Marbles, Chain tig, Hopscotch and Skipping.One of my favourite games is called "Murder Mysteries".
